mapper.insert: insert into spon(user_no, artist_no, spon_date, price, status, type, board_no, purchase_token, receipt_id, purchase_status, verify_status, platform, product_id, currency, order_id) VALUES (#{user_no}, #{artist_no}, #{spon_date}, #{price}, #{status}, #{type}, #{board_no}, #{purchase_token}, #{receipt_id}, #{purchase_status}, #{verify_status}, #{platform}, #{product_id}, #{currency}, #{order_id})
mapper.select: select * from spon order by spon_date DESC
select * from spon WHERE verify_status NOT IN (0) ORDER BY spon_date DESC
select * from spon WHERE verify_status = 0 AND status = false AND send_date IS NULL ORDER BY spon_date DESC
select * from spon WHERE verify_status = 0 AND status = true AND send_date IS NULL ORDER BY spon_date DESC
select * from spon WHERE verify_status = 0 AND status = true AND send_date IS NOT NULL ORDER BY spon_date DESC
select EXISTS(select * from spon WHERE receipt_id = #{receipt_id}) as success;
